meanings.definition: A payment made to a professional or institution for services rendered.
meanings.sent1: I had to pay a fee to the doctor for my check-up.
meanings.sent2: The school charges a fee for extracurricular activities.
meanings.sent3: The fee to see the magician perform was worth every penny.
meanings.sent4: The fee for the online course opened the door to a world of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The fee acted as a ticket to enter the event.

meanings.definition: An amount of money charged for a particular privilege or service.
meanings.sent1: The entrance fee to the park was affordable for families.
meanings.sent2: The fee for using the gym facilities is included in the membership.
meanings.sent3: Paying the fee felt like unlocking a special bonus level in a game.
meanings.sent4: The fee was a small price to pay for the convenience it offered.
meanings.sent5: The fee was like a key that allowed access to exclusive benefits.
